mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_user_info_base(phone,name, idCard, qq, webChat, chsiAccount, chsiPwd)VALUES (#{phone} ,#{name}, #{idCard},#{qq},#{webChat}, #{chsiAccount}, #{chsiPwd})
